app_description_short.message: One-click webpage to PDF converter for Chrome. Fast, high quality, preserves original layout and formatting.
app_description_short.description: Short store description optimized for search: webpage, PDF, converter, one-click, Chrome, preserves layout

optionsSaveAsDescription.message: When enabled, the PDF will be saved directly to the default download folder without prompting for a path.

optionsSaveAsTip.message: 💡 Tip: Disable for manual save location selection.

optionsStickerTitle.message: 🔗 Record URL at the top of the PDF

optionsStickerDescription.message: When enabled, the source URL of the webpage will be displayed at the top of the generated PDF file.

optionsStickerTip.message: 💡 Tip: Disable for a clean PDF.

optionsPrescrollDescription.message: Ensures all images are fully loaded by scrolling down the page before capture, which is necessary for modern web technologies like lazy loading.

optionsPrescrollTip.message: 💡 Tip: Disable if animations or videos cause capture failures.

optionsPatchesDescription.message: Automatically fixes common page layout issues to ensure content integrity. It's recommended to keep this enabled.

optionsPatchesTip.message: 💡 Tip: Disable if the generated PDF has content anomalies.

optionsExpandScrollableDescription.message: Automatically expands all scrollable content areas (like comment sections) to prevent incomplete PDFs.

optionsExpandScrollableTip.message: 💡 Tip: Disable if the page is too long or the PDF is abnormal.

optionsHideFixedDescription.message: Automatically shields floating elements that affect reading, such as customer service pop-ups, ads, etc.

optionsHideFixedTip.message: 💡 Tip: Disable to keep fixed elements like chat windows.

context_convert_page.description: Context menu: convert current page to PDF

banner_converting.description: Status text shown while converting the page to PDF
